Just trying to figure out how best to fit a headlining in my 67 11-window kombi. I've run it for 12 years with bare metal and dynamat as it never had one when I bought it. I've got a couple of questions about standard/original headliners in later splits if anyone can help;

The rear bow/rod which runs through the headlining to hold it up; how far from the back of the bus does it sit? My bus seems to have no holes for the bow to clip into so I guess the metal rod just sits in the top of the gutter above the windows, but I have no ideas where abouts it should be!?

How long is the above bow/rod? I bought a replacement from VW Heritage and it seems way too long and simply won't fit. Just wondered if anyone had an original one kicking about and could measure?

Does anyone have any pics of a well fitted headlining which they could post, especially the front area around the air vents and the rear area with the rear bow and rear door hinge covers?

Ta
Steven
